entity.name: TEST ECT: Wuhan sees first coronavirus cluster since end of lockdown

text: @SenJeffMerkley @realDonaldTrump Why don’t you let folks know that in Australia, going into their flu season have an infection rate of .00025% instead of telling us what’s going on at the origination point of the coronavirus and how lovely a place Wuhan is. Really tired of your TDS stuff.
